module.sqlWrap: SELECT Top (@Top) * FROM CircleGift WHERE (CircleId=@CircleId) AND (GiftId > @MaxId) ORDER BY GiftId DESC
SELECT Top (@Top) * FROM CircleGift WHERE (CircleId=@CircleId) AND (GiftId < @MinId) ORDER BY GiftId DESC
SELECT Top (@Top) * FROM CircleGift WHERE (PassportId=@PassportId) ORDER BY GiftId DESC

INSERT INTO CircleGift(GiftTypeId,GiftName,CircleId,PassportId,AdminPassportId,Quantity,Price,TatalPrice,CreatedTime) VALUES (@GiftTypeId,@GiftName,@CircleId,@PassportId,@AdminPassportId,@Quantity,@Price,@TatalPrice,@CreatedTime) UPDATE Circle SET GiftCount=GiftCount+(@Quantity) WHERE CircleId=@CircleId SELECT @@IDENTITY
